topics.body:
Going back to puella magi madoka again here's something interesting; thelore is based off Islamic ideology that what led to satan's downfall was that he loved god too much.

It's interesting when you think about it from a philosophical standpoint that love can be good or evil cause just cause you love someone and are doing something for them doesn't automatically mean you're doing the right thing.

topics.body:
Yo; I just had a interesting thought about mythology; why is it in most mythology and religions supernatural creatures take the shape of humans or animals?

Purely hypothetically speaking let's say they exist; how do we know that they're not eldritch abominations?
